ActCanada Student Financial Assistance Act
Canada Student Loans Act
PrecisREGULATIONS AMENDING THE CANADA STUDENT LOANS REGULATIONS AND THE CANADA STUDENT FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE REGULATIONS in order to enhance the effectiveness of the Canada Student Loans Program (CSLP) in delivering student financial assistance to post-secondary education students. The amendments restructure financial assistance to students (FAS) by reviewing the grants given under the SCFAR (Canada Student Grants Program, Transition Grant, and Grant Overawards).
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2009-0143 Publication Date: 2009-05-27
